name: One of Many (FortifiedGames)
description:
One of Many

You have just robbed a bank. I can't fathom the adrenaline rush you must be having... But you must stay alert, the cops are on the way! Use WASD to move and your mouse to look around. After 15 seconds of observing the pedestrians, you have to dress like them: choose the most common hat, shirt and pants in order to hide in the masses and get away from the police. Good luck, robber!

This game was made in 3 hours by a team of 2 people for Trijam #123.
Coding, testing: FortifiedGames (me)
3d models, music, testing: hunman20
